name: The Maze: A Slime Story
description: The Maze: A Slime Story is a high school project of mine made in Unity 3D. The game is a first person 3D maze game where you are to find the key hidden in the maze and then go to the exit to complete the level. You will also have to avoid enemy red slimes. You have the option of playing through every level  to complete the story, or you can choose to play any level in the level select. Assets and textures are not mine.
